cast.overview: Kid is an anonymous young man who ekes out a meager living in an underground fight club where, night after night, wearing a gorilla mask, he is beaten bloody by more popular fighters for cash. After years of suppressed rage, Kid discovers a way to infiltrate the enclave of the city’s sinister elite. As his childhood trauma boils over, his mysteriously scarred hands unleash an explosive campaign of retribution to settle the score with the men who took everything from him.
cast.title: Monkey Man

details.biography: Sikandar Kher (born 31 October 1982) is an Indian actor. He made his acting debut with the film, Woodstock Villa (2008). His most notable roles include Nirmal in Khelein Hum Jee Jaan Sey (2010), Inspector Dev Phogat in Aurangzeb (2013), Nishikant in Monica, O My Darling (2022), and Rana Singh in Monkey Man (2024). He is stepson of a well-known Bollywood actor, Anupam Kher.
details.name: Sikandar Kher
